title: Five Little Animals Dancing on the FarmEP143Song for KidsBebefinn Nursery Rhymes

subtasks: Waving hands like animals
Horsing around (galloping)
Stomping like horses
Clapping like ducks
Sheep dance (likely involving mimicking sheep movements)
Jumping like dogs
Shaking body like pigs
Hopping like rabbits
Dancing collectively as all five animals

Cats joining the dance party (but not specified, more like saying "Dance and dance and dance and dance and thanks" with others already in the dance) which is probably not a specific action but mimicking: As cats are often associated with curiosity and playfulness, possibly include some playful curiously twitching ears or eyes, or slightly jumping around. But if the transcript doesn't mention cats, then it might be enough just to be included in the "Dance collectively" subtask).
Contorting body like animals (e.g., hog rolling, duck waddle, sheep bleat while hopping, etc.)
Acting out四是 different livestock or animals in a barnyard setting

tasks.task: Leading a group animal dance where each step is demonstrated by an individual and then repeated by the group.

subtasks: Leading the horse dance (stomping and galloping)
Leading the duck dance (clapping)
Leading the sheep dance (sheepish movement, e.g., leaping or waddling)
Leading the dog dance (jumping)
Leading the pig dance (body shaking)
Leading the rabbit dance (hopping)
Executing the group dance sequence (all animals performing their moves together)
Facilitating group applause after each individual dance
Participating in the final 'boo!' and cat dance excitement (enthusiastic participation)
